It’s like...the quickest scroll past ever guys
It’s a different time now. Sponsored posts from people in my feed is now an expected, given annoyance. If someone’s good doesn’t outweigh the annoying bad, then adios.
I say no to Instagram shilling ... a few times a day, every day. It needs to be a small part of a larger campaign to be considered. Then I gotta love it.

But like...celebs do hair care commercials or something on your television, or sell a makeup line, they want you to post about it. Unless you are talking about strictly Instagram stuff like tummy tea and corsets (I don’t do those)
It’s never just Instagram work. You sign up to endorse a brand and do a commercial for them and part of the deal now is always a few social posts. I do it if I love the company and also, the money?

Going back and forth on email over a sentence change with a brand strategy team who then has to go back and forth with a giant company like unilever/PG is a lot sometimes. But yeah. Just a lot of cooks in the kitchen, more than people imagine.
I’ll never get it either. And brands do not like bending on their “suggested copy” so it’s just easier to do what they say, even though it could be better 100 percent of the time. This is my life.
